name: gear-grind
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in one turn.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.
